div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 841 Kralevo, c. 25 km. SW of Sumen, Bul- garia, 1946 Burial: c. 300 B.C.? (T) Contents: 300 AR, AE. Pot hoard Alexander III: 300 tetradr. Cassander: AE Disposition: V. Haralanov, Sumen 12 Alex- ander, 1 Cassander Gerasimov, BIAB 17 (1950), p. 317
